Translations.Text: Ara yakhana'i mara'iyama-tanayera drstanta pesa kara haya, takhana apanara sampradaya tate soragola arambha kare deya
Ara tara bale, ‘amadera upasyagulo sraestha na ‘isa?’ Era sudhu baka-bitandara uddesye'i take apanara samane pesa kare. Baram era eka jhagarate sampradaya
Tini to kebala amara'i eka banda, yara upara amara anugraha karechilama ebam take baniyechilama bani isara'ilera jan'ya drstanta
Ara yadi amara icche karatama tabe tomadera paribarte pheresata srsti karate paratama, yara yamine uttaradhikari hata
Ara niscaya ‘isa kiyamatera niscita nidarsana; kaje'i tomara kiyamate sandeha karona. Ara tomara amara'i anusarana kara. Eta'i sarala patha
Sayatana yena tomaderake kichute'i badha na deya, niscaya se tomadera prakasya sakra

Ara ‘isa yakhana spasta pramanadisaha asala, takhana tini balechilena, ‘ami abasya'i tomadera kache esechi hikamatasaha ebam tomara ye kichu bisaye matabheda karacha, ta spasta kare deyara jan'ya. Kaje'i tomara allahara taka'oya abalambana kara ebam amara anugatya kara’
Niscaya allaha, tini amara raba ebam tomadera'o raba, ata'eba tomara tamra ‘ibadata kara; eta'i sarala patha.’
Atahpara tadera madhya theke katagulo dala matanaikya karala, kaje'i yalimadera jan'ya durbhoga yantranadayaka dinera sastira
Tara to tadera ajnatasare hathat kare kiyamata asara'i apeksa karache
Bandhura sedina haye parabe eke an'yera satrau, muttakira chara
He amara bandagana! Aja tomadera kono bhaya ne'i ebam tomara cintita'o habe na
Yara amara ayate imana enechila ebam yara chila musalima
tomara ebam tomadera strigana [1] sanande jannate prabesa kara
Sbarnera thala o panapatra niye taderake pradaksina kara habe; sekhane mana ya caya ebam yate nayana trpta haya ta'i thakabe. Ara sekhane tomara sthayi habe
Ara eta'i jannata, tomaderake yara adhikari kara hayeche, tomadera kajera phalasbarupa
Sekhane tomadera jan'ya rayeche pracura phalamula, ta theke tomara khabe
Niscaya aparadhira jahannamera sastite sthayi habe
tadera sasti laghaba kara habe na ebam tara tate hatasa haye parabe
Ara amara tadera prati yuluma karini, kintu tara nijera'i chila yalima
Tara citkara kare balabe, ‘he maleka [1], tomara raba yena amaderake nihsesa kare dena.’ Se balabe, ‘niscaya tomara abasthanakari habe.’
Allaha balabena, ‘abasya'i amara tamadera kache satya niye esechilama, kintu tomadera besira bhaga'i chile satya apachandakari.’
Naki tara kono byapare curanta sid'dhanta grahana kareche? Niscaya ami'i to curanta sid'dhantakari
Naki tara mane kare ye, amara tadera gopana bisaya o mantrana sunate pa'i na? Abasya'i, hyam. Ara amadera pheresatagana tadera kache theke sabakichu likhache
Baluna, ‘dayamaya allahara kono santana thakale ami hatama tamra ibadate ghrnakaridera agrani
‘tara ya aropa kare ta theke asamanasamuha o yaminera raba ebam ‘arasera raba pabitra-mahana
Ata'eba apani taderake chere dina tara magna thakuka behuda kathaya ebam matta thakuka khela-tamasaya ye dinera oyada deya hayeche tara sam'mukhina ha'oyara aga paryanta
Ara tini'i satya ilah‌ asamane ebam tini'i satya ilah‌ yamine. Ara tini hikamata'oyala, sarbajna
Ara tini barakatamaya, yara kartrtbe rayeche asamanasamuha, yamina o e du’yera madhyabarti samasta kichu. Ara kiyamatera jnana sudhu tamra'i ache ebam tamra'i kache tomaderake pratyabartita kara habe
Ara tini chara tara yaderake dake, tara suparisera malika habe na, tabe tara chara, yara jene-sune satya saksya deya
Ara yadi apani taderake jijnesa karena, ke taderake srsti kareche, tara abasya'i balabe, ‘allaha.’ Atahpara tara kothaya phire yacche
ara tara (rasula) e ukti: ‘He amara raba! Niscaya era emana sampradaya yara imana anabe na.’
Kaje'i apani taderake upeksa karuna ebam baluna, ‘salama' ; atahpara tara sighra'i janate parabe
Ha - mima
Sapatha suspasta kitabera
Niscaya amara eta nayila karechi eka mubaraka rate [1]; niscaya amara satarkakari
Se rate pratyeka curanta sid'dhanta sthirakrta haya
amadera paksa theke adesakrame, niscaya amara rasula preranakari
apanara rabera rahamatasbarupa; niscaya tini sarbasrota, sarbajna—
asamanasamuha, yamina o e du’yera madhyabarti samasta kichura raba, yadi tomara niscita bisbasi ha'o
Tini chara kono satya ilaha ne'i, tini jibana dana karena ebam tini'i mrtyu ghatana; tini tomadera raba ebam tomadera pitrpurusadera'o raba
Baram tara sandehera basabarti haye khela -- tamasa karache
Ata'eba apani apeksa karuna se dinera yedina spasta dhomyaya acchanna habe akasa
ta abrta kare phelabe lokaderake. Eta yantranadayaka sasti
(Tara balabe) ‘he amadera raba! Amadera theke sasti dura karuna, niscaya amara mumina haba.’
Tara ki kare upadesa grahana karabe? Athaca itopurbe tadera kache eseche spasta eka rasula
tarapara tara tara theke mukha phiriye niyechila ebam balechila, ‘e eka siksaprapta pagala!’
Niscaya amara alpa samayera jan'ya sasti rahita karaba --- (kintu) niscaya tomara tomadera agera abasthaya phire yabe
Yedina amara prabalabhabe pakara'o karaba, sedina niscaya amara haba pratisodha grahanakari
